titleStmt.title: By the Honorable, William Stoughton Esq. lieutenant governour and commander in chief. A proclamation Whereas the ship Adventure of London ... Given at the Council chamber in Boston, the first day of April 1699. ...
titleStmt.author: Massachusetts. Lieutenant Governor (1692-1701 : Stoughton)
Stoughton, William, 1632-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bartholomew Green and John Allen ...],

notesStmt.note: Place and printer suggested by Wing.
Proclamation ordering the arrest of Joseph Bradish and others for piracy.
Reproduction of original in the Massachusetts Historical Society Library.
